hiveArticle.body:
### <center> Namaste, Have a great day everyone </center>

<hr>

###  <center>My today's entry for #beachwednesday</center>

 <hr>

## <center>Digha Beach in West Bengal </center>

This image was taken last year on my visit to Digha which is a small town on the boundary of West Bengal and Odisha. It is actually a perfect weekend gataway for people who stay in Kolkata because it is just 3 hours journey to Digha.

<hr>

![IMG_20161216_162133480.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQZ973uKAnwzSxKABq6hkT5BBCiQShAoz5PGfHgVuCxNu/IMG_20161216_162133480.jpg)

<hr>

### <center>Camera - Motorola X Play, No Editing</center>
